Tests
============

Tests are located in 2 files

* test.py
* testRemoteWebdriver.py

To run tests located in first file *test.py* you have to type the following command

   .. code-block:: bash

        python test.py

Tests located in the second file *testRemoteWebdriver.py* required specific environment. You have to run selenium-server-standalone. Read the installation page to run selenium-server-standalone. Then type the following command:

   .. code-block:: bash

         python testRemoteWebdriver.py
